content.query:
create database NextGenDW

use nextgendw

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Customers](
	[CustomerID] [int] NOT NULL,
	[CustomerName] [nvarchar](100) NOT NULL,	
	[PhoneNumber] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL,
	[FaxNumber] [nvarchar](20) NOT NULL,	
	[WebsiteURL] [nvarchar](256) NOT NULL,
	[DeliveryAddressLine1] [nvarchar](60) NOT NULL,
	[DeliveryAddressLine2] [nvarchar](60) NULL,
	[DeliveryPostalCode] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL,
	[PostalAddressLine1] [nvarchar](60) NOT NULL,
	[PostalAddressLine2] [nvarchar](60) NULL,
	[PostalPostalCode] [nvarchar](10) NOT NULL
)
WITH(
	LOCATION = 'https://web.azuresynapse.net/en-us/authoring/explore/linked/storageaccounts/azsynapse-ws-WorkspaceDefaultStorage-nxtgenstagingdl%2Fsalescustomer?relativePath=home&subFolderPath=&workspace=%2Fsubscriptions%2Fdb426612-8b27-469c-9d8f-e1dd556774e9%2FresourceGroups%2FAzureTraining%2Fproviders%2FMicrosoft.Synapse%2Fworkspaces%2Fazsynapse-ws',
    DATA_SOURCE = EDS_salescustomer,  
    FILE_FORMAT = DELIMITEDTEXT
)
